classitems.author:
troffmo5 / http://github.com/troffmo5

Effect to render the scene in stereo 3d side by side with lens distortion.
It is written to be used with the Oculus Rift (http://www.oculusvr.com/) but
it works also with other HMD using the same technology

classitems.description:
oculus_leap_visualization.js
Implementation of 3D immersion mode for the CTIANP project with Oculus Rift and LeapMotion controller
classitems.author: Zeshawn Shaheen

classitems.description: When the window is loaded, the code will begin.
classitems.name: onload

classitems.description: Constructor for the menu.
classitems.name: menu

classitems.description: Sends an AJAX request for the list of files a given folder.
classitems.name: ajaxRequestFiles

params.name: dir
params.description: Path to the folder.

classitems.description: Sends an AJAX request for the list of folders in the fort.300_parsed folder.
classitems.name: ajaxRequestFolders

params.name: dir
params.description: Path to the fort.300_parsed folder.

classitems.description: Resets the position and rotation of both molecules to their original location.
classitems.name: resetMoleculePos

classitems.description: Initializes the menu.
classitems.name: initMenu

classitems.description: Initializes the three.js variables, fps counter, left/right objects and left/right labels.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Creates a connection using the Oculus Bridge software from https://github.com/Instrument/oculus-bridge
classitems.name: initOculus

classitems.description: Centers the rendering area in the browser. Called when the window is resized.
classitems.name: onResize

classitems.description: Updates the Oculus Rift's configuration.
classitems.name: bridgeConfigUpdated

params.name: config
params.description: Holds the configuration information.

classitems.description: Updates the Oculus Rift when the orientation is changed.
classitems.name: bridgeOrientationUpdated

params.name: quatValues
params.description: The quaternion of the current position of the Oculus Rift.

classitems.description: Rotates the object around the axis (in world coordinates) by a certain amount of radians
classitems.name: rotateAroundWorldAxis

params.name: object
params.description: The object that is needed to be rotated.

params.name: axis
params.description: A vector specifying the axis of rotation.

params.name: radians
params.description: The amount in radians that the object will be rotated.

classitems.description: Returns the average position of the atoms for a given molecule file.
classitems.name: avgPos

params.name: data
params.description: A n x 4 array where n is the numberOfAtoms.

params.name: numberOfAtoms
params.description: The number of atoms in the molecule.

return.description: The average position of the molecule in world coordinates.

classitems.description: Draws the molecule to the scene
classitems.name: drawMolecule

params.name: atoms
params.description: An n x 4 array where n is the numberOfAtoms.

params.name: numberOfAtoms
params.description: The number of atoms in the molecule.

params.name: atomCenter
params.description: A 3 dimensional vector that has the center of the molecule in world coordinates.

params.name: molObj
params.description: The actual object that will be displayed.

classitems.description: Draws a cylinder between two points
classitems.name: cylinderBetweenPoints

params.name: vstart
params.description: A 3 dimensional vector of the beginning of the cylinder

params.name: vend
params.description: A 3 dimensional vector of the end of the cylinder

return.description: A mesh of the cylinder that will be added the object

classitems.description: Parses a file and will update object with the corresponding atoms
classitems.name: parseDataToAtoms

params.name: data
params.description: The raw data from the file

params.name: object
params.description: The object that will be filled with the data

classitems.description: Starts the chain of function calls that loads the data of a file into an object
classitems.name: drawObject

params.name: filename
params.description: The path to the file with the data.

params.name: object
params.description: The object that will be filled with data

params.name: isLeft
params.description: If true, 'object' is the left object. If false, 'object' is the right object.

classitems.description: Initializes the error labels
classitems.name: initErrors

classitems.description: Initializes the Leap Motion Controller
classitems.name: initLeap

classitems.description: The main rendering function. It also hands input from the Leap Motion Controller.
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Given the name of a file in a folder, it returns the original index of that file.
classitems.name: getIndex

params.name: string
params.description: The name of the file.

return.description: The position of the file relative to the parent folder.

classitems.description: The function that calls the render function.
classitems.name: animate

classitems.description: Adds ability of the left and right objects to rotate and  starts the renderer.
classitems.name: leapLoop
